issue.title: Fix for missing variable in setup_ios.rb

repository.name: fastlane
repository.description: ðŸš€ The easiest way to automate building and releasing your iOS and Android apps

body: @shubham-gupta-bs are you able to see if the latest fastlane fixes this issue for you?
This issue is coming in latest fastlane .
i also have the same problem

for me it gives
`undefined local variable or method notifier' for #<Scan::SlackPoster:0x007fcc15971588>`

Happened here on Scan Slack notify too: https://gist.github.com/ppamorim/51d4831c8c58cab830e997a411c79759
ðŸš« fastlane environment ðŸš« ### Stack | Key | Value | | --------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- | | OS | 10.12.5 | | Ruby | 2.2.4 | | Bundler? | false | | Git | git version 2.13.0 | | Installation Source | ~/.fastlane/bin/bundle/bin/fastlane | | Host | Mac OS X 10.12.5 (16F73) | | Ruby Lib Dir | ~/.fastlane/bin/bundle/lib | | OpenSSL Version | OpenSSL 1.0.2g 1 Mar 2016 | | Is contained | true | | Is homebrew | false | | Is installed via Fabric.app | false | | Xcode Path | /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/ | | Xcode Version | 8.3.3 | ### System Locale | Variable | Value | | | -------- | ----------- | - | | LANG | en_US.UTF-8 | âœ… | | LC_ALL | en_US.UTF-8 | âœ… | | LANGUAGE | en_US.UTF-8 | âœ… | ### fastlane files:
`./fastlane/Fastfile` ```ruby # More documentation about how to customize your build # can be found here: # https://docs.fastlane.tools fastlane_version "1.109.0" REQUIRED_XCODE_VERSION = "8.3.2" default_platform :ios generated_fastfile_id "d39bfbdc-7228-406f-ac73-a9f2f8253d95" REAL_APP_NAME_ARRAY = Array["T-Pro Dictate", "T-Pro Stat", "GC Dictate by T-Pro", "SSC Dictate by T-Pro"] POSSIBLE_SCHEME_ARRAY = Array["T_Pro_Dictate", "T_Pro_Stat", "T_Pro_Galway_Clinic", "T_Pro_SSC"] POSSIBLE_IDENTIFIER_ARRAY = Array["com.tpro.stat", "com.tpro.stat.private", "com.tpro.galway.clinic", "com.tpro.ssc.dictate"] POSSIBLE_PLIST_ARRAY = Array["Info_Dictate", "Info_Stat", "Info_Galway_Clinic", "Info_SSC"] before_all do ensure_git_status_clean end desc "Run unit test on a determined scheme" lane :test do scan( clean: false, workspace: "T_Pro_Dictate.xcworkspace", devices: ["iPhone 5", "iPhone 6s", "iPad Air", "iPad Pro (12.9 inch)"], scheme: "UnitTests", slack_url: "https://hooks.slack.com/services/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", slack_message: "Unit Test results:", slack_channel: "#fastlane_notify",) end # # Main lanes # desc "Upload all T-Pro Apps to TestFlight" lane :galway do if !UI.confirm("This action will deploy all apps to TestFlight. Are you sure?") UI.abort_with_message!("Aborted, user cancelled action") end notify_slack( true, ":white_check_mark: Running lane Galway! Starting batch compilation to TestFlight of #{REAL_APP_NAME_ARRAY.join(", ")}", "", "") # Remove all caches clear_derived_data clean_cocoapods_cache # Install cocoapods dependencies cocoapods # Run unit tests test POSSIBLE_SCHEME_ARRAY.each_with_index do |scheme, index| beta(schemeIndex: index) end end desc "Upload all T-Pro Apps to production" lane :dublin do if !UI.confirm("This action will deploy all apps to production. Are you sure?") UI.abort_with_message!("Aborted, user cancelled action") end notify_slack( true, ":white_check_mark: Running lane Dublin! Starting batch compilation to production of #{REAL_APP_NAME_ARRAY.join(", ")}", "", "") # Remove all caches clear_derived_data clean_cocoapods_cache # Install cocoapods dependencies cocoapods # Run unit tests test POSSIBLE_SCHEME_ARRAY.each_with_index do |scheme, index| release(schemeIndex: index) end end desc "Upload a new version of T-Pro app to TestFlight" lane :beta do |options| schemeIndex = options[:schemeIndex] if schemeIndex == nil schemeNickName = verifySchemeName() schemeNickNameIndex = REAL_APP_NAME_ARRAY.find_index(schemeNickName) if schemeNickNameIndex == nil UI.error("Scheme not informed, build aborted") end scheme = POSSIBLE_SCHEME_ARRAY[schemeNickNameIndex] identifier = POSSIBLE_IDENTIFIER_ARRAY[schemeNickNameIndex] infoPlist = POSSIBLE_PLIST_ARRAY[schemeNickNameIndex] # Remove all caches clear_derived_data clean_cocoapods_cache # Install cocoapods dependencies cocoapods # Run unit tests test # Check if the version or build number needs to be changed verifyVersion(infoPlist) else schemeNickName = REAL_APP_NAME_ARRAY[schemeIndex] scheme = POSSIBLE_SCHEME_ARRAY[schemeIndex] identifier = POSSIBLE_IDENTIFIER_ARRAY[schemeIndex] infoPlist = POSSIBLE_PLIST_ARRAY[schemeIndex] # Remove all caches clear_derived_data end infoPlistPath = "./T_Pro/#{infoPlist}.plist" versionNumber = get_info_plist_value(path: infoPlistPath, key: "CFBundleShortVersionString") buildNumber = get_info_plist_value(path: infoPlistPath, key: "CFBundleVersion") # THIS IS NOT WORKING: https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/issues/11420 # actualBuildNumber = latest_testflight_build_number( # version: versionNumber, # app_identifier: identifier, # initial_build_number: 0.1, # live: false) # if actualBuildNumber.to_f <= buildNumber.to_f # notify_slack( # true, # "Build to TestFlight of #{schemeNickName} aborted, build number (#{buildNumber}) needs to be bigger than actual value (#{actualBuildNumber}) :dolly:", # "", # "") # return # end puts ":white_check_mark: Starting compilation to TestFlight of #{schemeNickName}" notify_slack( true, ":white_check_mark: Starting compilation to TestFlight of #{schemeNickName}", "", "") # Make sure provisioning profiles are up to date sign(identifier) build(schemeNickName, false, true, scheme, versionNumber, buildNumber) uploadTestFlight(schemeNickName, identifier, versionNumber, buildNumber) # End up cleaning any build archive. clear_derived_data clearArchive() clearBuildIpaDsym() end desc "Upload a new version of T-Pro app to production" lane :release do |options| schemeIndex = options[:schemeIndex] if schemeIndex == nil schemeNickName = verifySchemeName() schemeNickNameIndex = REAL_APP_NAME_ARRAY.find_index(schemeNickName) if schemeNickNameIndex == nil UI.error("Scheme not informed, build aborted") end scheme = POSSIBLE_SCHEME_ARRAY[schemeNickNameIndex] identifier = POSSIBLE_IDENTIFIER_ARRAY[schemeNickNameIndex] infoPlist = POSSIBLE_PLIST_ARRAY[schemeNickNameIndex] # Remove all caches clear_derived_data clean_cocoapods_cache # Install cocoapods dependencies cocoapods # Run unit tests test # Check if the version or build number needs to be changed verifyVersion(infoPlist) else schemeNickName = REAL_APP_NAME_ARRAY[schemeIndex] scheme = POSSIBLE_SCHEME_ARRAY[schemeIndex] identifier = POSSIBLE_IDENTIFIER_ARRAY[schemeIndex] infoPlist = POSSIBLE_PLIST_ARRAY[schemeIndex] # Remove all caches clear_derived_data end infoPlistPath = "./T_Pro/#{infoPlist}.plist" versionNumber = get_info_plist_value(path: infoPlistPath, key: "CFBundleShortVersionString") buildNumber = get_info_plist_value(path: infoPlistPath, key: "CFBundleVersion") # THIS IS NOT WORKING: https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/issues/11420 # actualBuildNumber = latest_testflight_build_number( # version: versionNumber, # app_identifier: identifier, # initial_build_number: 0.1, # live: false) # if actualBuildNumber.to_f <= buildNumber.to_f # notify_slack( # true, # "Build to TestFlight of #{schemeNickName} aborted, build number (#{buildNumber}) needs to be bigger than actual value (#{actualBuildNumber}) :dolly:", # "", # "") # return # end puts ":white_check_mark: Starting compilation to production of #{schemeNickName}" notify_slack( true, ":white_check_mark: Starting compilation to production of #{schemeNickName}", "", "") # Make sure provisioning profiles are up to date sign(identifier) build(schemeNickName, true, true, scheme, versionNumber, buildNumber) uploadProduction(false, schemeNickName, identifier, versionNumber, buildNumber) # End up cleaning any build archive. clear_derived_data clearArchive() clearBuildIpaDsym() end # # Default functions # def verifySchemeName() schemeNickName = UI.select("Please select a scheme: ", REAL_APP_NAME_ARRAY) schemeNickName end desc "Clear archives directory" def clearArchive() sh("rm -vfr ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/Archives/*") end desc "Clear any build artifact on the root directory" def clearBuildIpaDsym() sh("rm -vfr ../*.dSYM.zip") sh("rm -vfr ../*.ipa") end def verifyVersion(infoPlist) infoPlistPath = "./T_Pro/#{infoPlist}.plist" versionNumber = get_info_plist_value(path: infoPlistPath, key: "CFBundleShortVersionString") buildNumber = get_info_plist_value(path: infoPlistPath, key: "CFBundleVersion") needsUpdate = prompt( text: "The current version number: #{versionNumber}, build number: #{buildNumber}, do you want to update these values?", boolean: true) if needsUpdate newVersionNumber = UI.input("Please inform a new version number (leave blank to ignore)") newBuildNumber = UI.input("Please inform a new build number (leave blank to ignore)") if newVersionNumber != "" set_info_plist_value(path: infoPlistPath, key: "CFBundleShortVersionString", value: newVersionNumber) end if newBuildNumber != "" set_info_plist_value(path: infoPlistPath, key: "CFBundleVersion", value: newBuildNumber) end updatedVersionNumber = get_info_plist_value(path: infoPlistPath, key: "CFBundleShortVersionString") updatedBuildNumber = get_info_plist_value(path: infoPlistPath, key: "CFBundleVersion") UI.important "New version number: #{updatedVersionNumber}, new build number: #{updatedBuildNumber}" end end def sign(appId) udid = sigh( development: false, app_identifier: appId, output_path: "/tmp") ENV["PROJECT_UDID"] = udid end def build(appName, production, abortable, scheme, versionNumber, buildNumber) start = Time.now begin gym( scheme: scheme, export_method: "app-store", include_bitcode: true ) finish = Time.now notify_slack( true, ":white_check_mark: #{appName} compiled. Uploading to #{ production ? "production" : "TestFlight" }.", "Result", "Duration: #{finish - start} seconds\nVersion Number: #{versionNumber}\nBuild Number: #{buildNumber}") rescue => ex finish = Time.now notify_slack( false, "Failed to compile #{appName} build for #{ production ? "production" : "TestFlight" }. :dolly:", "Result", "Duration: #{finish - start} seconds\nVersion Number: #{versionNumber}\nBuild Number: #{buildNumber}\nException: #{ex}") if abortable UI.error("Exception: #{ex}") end end end def uploadProduction(abortable, appName, identifier, versionNumber, buildNumber) start = Time.now begin deliver( force: true, app_identifier: identifier) finish = Time.now notify_slack( true, ":white_check_mark: #{appName} successfully deployed to production.", "Result", "Duration: #{finish - start} seconds\nVersion Number: #{versionNumber}\nBuild Number: #{buildNumber}") rescue => ex finish = Time.now notify_slack( false, "Failed to deploy #{appName} to production. :dolly:", "Result", "Duration: #{finish - start} seconds\nVersion Number: #{versionNumber}\nBuild Number: #{buildNumber}\nException: #{ex}") if abortable UI.error("Exception: #{ex}") end end end def uploadTestFlight(appName, identifier, versionNumber, buildNumber) start = Time.now begin pilot( skip_waiting_for_build_processing: true, app_identifier: identifier) finish = Time.now notify_slack( true, ":white_check_mark: #{appName} successfully deployed on TestFlight.", "Result", "Duration: #{finish - start} seconds\nVersion Number: #{versionNumber}\nBuild Number: #{buildNumber}") rescue => ex finish = Time.now notify_slack( false, "Failed to deploy #{appName} on TestFlight. :dolly:", "Result", "Duration: #{finish - start} seconds\nVersion Number: #{versionNumber}\nBuild Number: #{buildNumber}\nException: #{ex}") UI.error("Exception: #{ex}") end end def notify_slack(success, message, title, value) slack( slack_url: "https://hooks.slack.com/services/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", message: message, username: "[iOS] Fastlane Bot", channel: "#fastlane_notify", success: success, default_payloads: [:git_branch, :git_author], attachment_properties: { fields: [{ title: title, value: value, short: false }] } ) end ```
`./fastlane/Appfile` ```ruby # The Appfile can be used to specify information that's used across all fastlane # tools, like your username or the app's bundle identifier. # # For more details, check out the documentation at: # https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/master/fastlane/docs/Appfile.md # app_identifier "com.your.app" # the bundle identifier of your app apple_id "info@tpro.ie" # Your Apple ID # ENV["realNames"] = Array["T-Pro Dictate", "T-Pro Stat", "Galway Clinic by T-Pro"].join(",") ```
